titles.title: Commemorating the 50th anniversary of California State University, Northridge (CSUN), an extraordinary public university dedicated to promoting the intellectual, economic, and cultural qualities of the San Fernando Valley.

Commemorating the 50th anniversary of California State University, Northridge (CSUN), an extraordinary public university dedicated to promoting the intellectual, economic, and cultural qualities of the San Fernando Valley.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Commemorates the 50th anniversary of California State University, Northridge.
Honors the school and its students, faculty, and staff for their invaluable contributions to higher education, advanced research, and community service.
